### Contract Description

The Correctional Service Canada (CSC) is seeking a supplier to provide Elder Helper Services in the Ontario Region. The Elder Helper will assist in delivering traditional healing and contemporary treatment interventions to Indigenous offenders within the federal institutions, while ensuring that these programs meet the evolving needs of this population.

The successful supplier will be required to:

* Assiste Indigenous offenders within the federal institutions in their traditional healing and contemporary treatment interventions.
* Assist the work of the Elders and the interdisciplinary team, including:
	+ Ensuring that offenders and staff approach the Elder providing service with the proper traditional protocol.
	+ Ensuring an adequate supply of traditional ceremonial materials is on hand.
	+ Coordinating and supervising offenders during traditional ceremonies.
* Perform traditional ceremonies in the absence of the Elder (if authorized by the Elder).
* Conduct group discussions and teachings (if authorized by the Elder).
* Participant in staff meetings to enhance team conception and create a healthy support network.
* Participate in meetings with staff to facilitate communication and cooperation with the Elder.
